mapper.update: UPDATE TB_Cash_Flow SET Delete_YN = 'Y' , UPDATE_ID = #{updateId} , UPDATE_DT = NOW() WHERE Cash_Flow_Seq = #{cashFlowSeq}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(Cash_Flow_Seq) FROM TB_Cash_Flow WHERE Customer_ID = #{customerId} AND Delete_YN = 'N'
AND date_format(Create_Dt,'%Y/%m/%d') between #{searchCreateDtFrom} AND #{searchCreateDtEnd}

SELECT Cash_Flow_Seq , TF.Customer_ID , Customer_Nm , Income_Amount , Receivable_Amount , Income_Way , Delete_YN , TF.Create_ID , TF.Create_Dt , TF.Update_ID , TF.Update_Dt FROM TB_Cash_Flow TF, TB_Customer TC WHERE Cash_Flow_Seq = #{cashFlowSeq} AND TF.Delete_YN = 'N' AND TF.`Customer_ID` = TC.`Customer_ID`

SELECT Sum(Income_Amount) incomeAmountSum , Sum(Receivable_Amount) receivableAmountSum, Sum(Receivable_Amount)- Sum(Income_Amount) receivableAmountNet FROM TB_Cash_Flow WHERE Customer_ID = #{customerId} AND Delete_YN = 'N'
